committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Patents, Copyrights and Trademarks

official_title: A bill to amend the Copyright Act in section 601 of title 17, United States Code, to provide for the manufacturing and public distribution of certain copyrighted material.
short_title: Manufacture and Public Distribution of Certain Copyrighted Material Act

summary.as: Reported to Senate amended, 2nd committee reporting
summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Finance with amendment, S. Rept. 99-322) Amends the copyright law to repeal the manufacturing clause which requires copies of certain English language works by U.S. authors to be manufactured in the United States or Canada to be eligible for U.S. copyright protection. Amends the Trade Act of 1974 to require the U.S. Trade Representative to identify and report to the Senate Finance Committee and House Ways and Means Committee by February 1, 1987, on barriers to trade printed material erected by specified countries.

titles.title: Manufacture and Public Distribution of Certain Copyrighted Material Act
Manufacture and Public Distribution of Certain Copyrighted Material Act
A bill to amend the Copyright Act in section 601 of title 17, United States Code, to provide for the manufacturing and public distribution of certain copyrighted material.
